Title: Instructions Not Included
Writer: Guillermo Ríos, Leticia López Margalli, Eugenio Derbez, Guillermo Ríos (story), Leticia López Margalli (story), Oscar Orlando Torres (story advisor), Gustavo Rodríguez (story advisor), David Hernández Miranda (story advisor)
Actors: Andrés Vázquez, Hugo Stiglitz, Eugenio Derbez, Leia Freitas
Plot: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.
